47.movie_plot: Ambitious but troubled movie director, Edward D. Wood Jr, tries his best to fulfill his dream, despite his lack of support.

33.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

5.movie_name: Wallace & Gromit: The Best of Aardman Animation (1996)

80.movie_plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

187.movie_plot: Wallace is used by a criminal penguin in a robbery involving mechanical trousers.

157.movie_plot: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

200.movie_plot: An incompetent, immature, and dimwitted heir to an auto parts factory must save the business to keep it out of the hands of his new, con-artist relatives and big business.

175.movie_plot: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

67.movie_plot: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

59.movie_plot: Tom Regan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

246.movie_plot: A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.

94.movie_plot: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

65.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

237.movie_plot: A journalist duo go on a tour of serial killer murder sites with two companions, unaware that one of them is a serial killer himself.

17.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

181.movie_plot: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

60.movie_plot: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

26.movie_plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, Sir William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

160.movie_plot: A partially idealized and fictionalized film of the controversial pornography publisher and how he became a defender of free speech for all people.

259.movie_plot: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a nineteenth-century inventor-villain.

235.movie_plot: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

197.movie_plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

222.movie_plot: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

250.movie_plot: When a young woman becomes afflicted by stigmata, a priest is sent to investigate her case, which may have severe ramifications for his faith and for the Catholic Church itself.

145.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

177.movie_plot: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.
